conclusion: The problem involves predicting which container (E, F, or G) the liquid will flow into after passing through baffles.

There are three containers labeled E, F, and G at the bottom of the image.
There are baffles of different colors and orientations between the outlets and containers, which guide the flow of liquid.

conclusion: The liquid from A and B flows to the left after hitting the orange slanted barrier.
